doc.title: The Great Divorce
doc.plot: 'The Great Divorce' is an eerily unique work of fantasy by C. S. Lewis. An adventure-laden tale in the vein of 'Lord of the Rings' and 'The Lion, The Witch, and The Wardrobe', The Great Divorce chronicles one man's harrowing journey from the wasteland of the Grey Town to the outskirts of heaven.
